tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My go to place for all my dental problems. Dr. BHAVESH is warm and transparent of the problem and it’s diagnosis. And he took me through the entire process with a calm demeanour. His calmness really helps the patient overcome the anxiety. The staff is also very sweet and always smiling. They also make it every easy to get though the procedure. 

My best part is the decor of the clinic. It doesn’t feel like you have come to a doctor. But a fun day at a playhouse. 

I got my wisdom tooth and a stubborn mucocele extracted. 

P.S : I wish I had such a chill dentist as a kid.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very happy Dr Bhavesh has treated my son. He is wonderful Dr and a human being.He is perfect person from who u can treat ur child. Very satisfied from treatment.Highly recoverable.

tags: None
review: I am 29 year old person. I was having severe pain in my tooth. My friend recommended me to visit Vibgyor Dental Clinic. Before visiting the clinic I had word with Dr. Bhavesh Rusawat on phone. He was very cordial in his approach. When I visited the clinic I was awestruck by the look of it. The clinic was state-of-the-art and had vibrant colored rooms. It has separate rooms for different functionalities. In short it had all the facilities in one clinic. I need not wait at the reception and was taken into treatment at the same time as I had appointment. The treatment was painless. I had filling done in my teeth. Now after few days I can eat anything hot and cold without any pain in my tooth. I would surely recommend Vibgyor dental clinic to my family members,peers and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I can say Dr Bhavesh is very soft-spoken person. I remember I took his number online and called him at morning 3:30 A.M. as my tooth was very painful. In early morning also he listen my issue and advise me to visit his clinic next morning.. when I was going to his clinic I was very scraed but when he operate me.. I was relex that I was in safe hands... After 15 days my all pain n problems were solved.. I m strongly recommend this Dr.Bhavesh... he is very nice in his profession...friendly .. very explanarltive... N god harted....thank u Dr.😊😊😊😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I called to check the charges for filling tooth but I was told that doctor only can tell that and was asked to come to clinic. After reaching clinic too I asked for the charges at reception but I was given hand plastic gloves and told to go in and sit. Suddenly a guy comes from somewhere and asks me to open mouth and start looking gap to be filled without giving me an opportunity to tell or ask anything.
Then i am told that xray should be taken and teeth had to removed. I refused and told that I want second opinion. Then while leaving I was charged 500 Rs.
Note: The receptionist was just wearing simple mask and even the doctor was just using mask. But when I asked for the reason of such high consultation fee that too not informing when I asked several times, I was told at end that they are charging PPE set cost too.
reply_text: Mr. Vinay we are always obliged to give best treatment to our patient, and every individual understands the pain taken by doctors and clinic staff in this covid situation. we are not entertaining patient who just want to come for window shopping and risk our other patients, hence our every online site mentions the consultation charges. sorry if you have missed reading the consultation charges, better find/read all details online next time. and kindly do not consider clinic and hospitals as vegetable market, garage, or any other place  were you bargain things.

tags: Value for money,
review: He is just too friendly. Lol he treated me like a kid durting my surgery.  * ***** ** ** ******** **** *******  I never seen in 30years of life no doctor like him.  He asked me even before he starts to treat he gave me options if I wanted to be injected or sparyed ansthesia.. I was so scared of needles. And he did prick me and I dint even notice it.  Everything wentso smooth . Even before I opened my eyes I got rid of my rotten wisdom tooth. I recommend him to everyone who is reading this comment.  I also suggest your kids would love him too and the doc bhavesh loves kids , he is very gentle and very gentle during the surgery.  I was in paradise during the treatment lol.  And very reasonable price.  Thank you practo and I would like to thank the doc too for a wonderful job.  Even the prescription he wrote the tablets wasn't so bitter as expected.  One them painkiller tasted like candy. Blessed be doc bhavesh. Wish to have more docs like him.  Awesome person to be too good as a doc. Bless up bhavesh
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bhavesh and his staff is very soft spoken and professional at the same time. Clinic is spacious, neat, clean and at very approachable location. His charges are affordable. My son (now 13) is under his treatment since last more than four years as the issue he is treating is complicated. However we are very happy with the results so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Rusawat was very warm and interactive throughout my treatment. What I appreciate the most is that he explained the procedure and treatment options transparently, with associated pros and cons. His approach is highly clinical and patient centric. Dr. Rusawat's clinic is a class apart in decor and facilities and state-of -art in definition.
I would recommend dr. Rusawat's vibgyor clinic to all. It's a complete family dentistry clinic.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words..

tags: None
review: Dr Bhavesh Rusawat treated my son's tooth and did two root canals . We are very satisfied and happy with the treatment... especially since my son (being 5 yrs old ) was very apprehensive initially about the treatment. Dr Bhavesh really knows how to treat children and makes them very comfortable by befriending them first

review: Our overall experience at VIBGYOR was very smooth and friendly. Firstly, Dr Bhavesh explained the entire procedure that he would be performing. Secondly, the medicines he prescribed for temporary relief worked well..I had to get my wisdom tooth extracted as it was causing me lot of pain.. the procedure was quick and pain-less. Equipments used were clean and hygienic.. would definitely recommend Dr Bhavesh for any dental treatment.

The clinic is well established with playing area for kids. Everything that one needs for dental treatment we can get it under one roof over here.
reply_text: Thank you for appreciation of doctor and clinic..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor was very patient with my 4 year old son.  During lockdown I very scared to take my son out but  the experience was very good.  adequate sanitization and precautions were taken to ensure social distancing and safety measures.   We finished the root canal in an hour and my son was very comfortable during the process.   Thank you so much and God Bless

tags: Value for money,
review: Very expensive.. way expensive compared to other dentists in the city. He does treatments  without informing us. Ex. He did flouride varnish which is worth 2200 without informing me and in the end when i checked bill he charged for it. I asked him to do 1000 rs tooth filling and in the bill it was 1200 rs.. so in short he charges as alot more than u think.. plz choose some other dentist people...
reply_text:
According to our records you had visited for your child treatment in month of January 2018, and treatment provided to your child was tooth coloured filling and fluoride varnish which was performed in multiple seatings..so how can we perform multiple seatings without taking your consent and without discussing the treatment plan..costing will vary with every clinic considering quality of treatment and material used..and sir you can go through the bill provided for all treatment..charges you paid for fluoride varnish is Rs.1500/-..
Sorry if you have misunderstood from our end..you are always welcome for the best quality treatment in future..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I went as I chipped off a part of my tooth 
Instead of recommending a filling to short term heel the issue the doctor directly asked me to think for Long term by getting implants and the cost of which was 11000 per tooth 
He told me that I had to do for atleast 6 upper teeth 
Maybe this is needed long term but directly jumping on it made me feel that he was not ready to heal the issue for now 
There was no solution provided to cure immediately 
I went to another doctor *** *********** ****** ** *** **** ***** ***** **** ********* **** **** ** ** *** ****** *********** *** *** *** ***** **** *** ***** ***** *** ********** *** ** *********** 
Not a good experience with this and will never visit again !!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very grateful to Doctor for opening clinic for my treatment for which i was suffering severely..In fact Dr called me twice to attend me but i being an old man was scared to go out of my house in such crisis time of lockdown..at last i visited Dr as my toothache had become unbearable...I am satisfied with the treatment given to me..I would like to take further treatment of my other problems of teeth after the lockdown is lifted...God bless the Doctor..it is really said that Dr is next to God..May all Doctors help old people like me at such crisis time...

review: I had gone for my daughter's teeth cavities. my daughter is 4 yrs old. The facility is really awesome. it's very kid friendly. Dr Bhavesh is very nice and makes kids feel at home. overall treatment was done perfectly. He explained what is wrong and what all options are available.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor has state-of-the-art set-up for the dental treatment of children. The doctor's behavior is also so friendly that my 3 year old child could undergo RCT and capping of his 4 teeth without much crying. The practical hand of the doctor is also good. Last but not the least, location of the clinic is close to Borivali Railway Station.

tags: None
review:
Good experience.
Underwent root canal treatment in upper teeth and it was a painless procedure.
The clinic is clean and well maintained.
Assistants are also very helpful and cordial.
It was a great experience.
